description.value: The character adds the first digit of their Corruption Points in metres to the range they can gain Pain Tokens. (EG: 39 corruption = +3 Metres)

system.benefit: The character adds the first digit of their Corruption Points in metres to the range they can gain Pain Tokens. (EG: 39 corruption = +3 Metres)

prerequisites.text: Dark Eldar, Power Through Pain, Corruption 10+
